formatDescription: The Corel Presentation Exchange file format is the presentation format of the CorelSuite applications. It is a recording of the display primitives of an application to a display interface. The CMX format supports Intel and Motorola binary formats.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 08/2023 (v.113) - Added priority over fmt/1886 (Resource Interchange Format (RIFF)). Submitted by New York Public Libraries and Preservica.

internalSignatures.name: Corel Metafile Exchange Image (16 bit)
internalSignatures.note: RIFF (little-endian) or RIFX (big-endian) Form labeled CMX1
